official-title.#text:
To waive the arbitrage rules for certain bonds issued in
		  1990 and partially defeased in 1996.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced
			 the following bill; which was referred to the

header.#text:
Waiver of arbitrage rules for
			 certain bonds

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall not apply to an issue of bonds that were
			 partially defeased, described in
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 148 of the
			 Internal Revenue Code of 1986

text.#text:
such bonds are
			 redeemed by the governmental unit that issued them within 90 days of the sale
			 of the escrow securities, and

any net profit
			 remaining after the proceeds of the sale of the escrow securities have been
			 applied to such redemption is used by the issuer for an essential governmental
			 function within twelve months of such redemption.

Bonds described in this subsection are bonds issued on
			 January 4, 1990, that were partially defeased on July 19, 1996, with revenues
			 of a municipally owned electric and water system.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 1197 IH: To waive the arbitrage rules for certain bonds issued in 1990 and partially defeased in 1996.
